game.name: Zombie Dodge
game.description:
You have previously played zombie games where you met only the dangerous and deadly undeads. However, today we have brought to you brand new adventure challenge where a horde of zombies you meet are not blood-thirsty, but they only aim to run fast to save their own lives. The theme has taken from the Ancient Egypt where you see plenty of fire balls falling from the night sky with an aim to clear the zombies from the screen. Do you think that you are capable enough to handle this situation? Join Zombie Dodge game and get ready help zombies to escape from the dangerous environment!

There are multiple fire balls and other dangerous traps would keep falling from the sky to kill them. Your objective is to control these little zombies to escape safely. Use the arrow keys to guide them towards the safe place.  Do not forget to grab some special pills to help them to boost their energy. You can also help them to grab some bubbles which provide them protection against the fire balls. Keep grabbing shields and coins to make it easier for the undeads to survive for long!

You need to put your skills and ability to test to make your win in this special html5 escaping game. It is up to you how long they survive. Their good survival rate would help you to reach on the top of the leaderboards in this highly addictive and challenging zombie game. Checkout more zombie-based games and have fun without download! All the best to become a champion of escaping!!

game.webControlKeys: A,D AND L-R ARROWS TO MOVE
